医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缩小放射学性别差距：未来的进展和挑战北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《RadioGraphics》今天发表的一篇社论称，放射学性别差距正在缩小，但仍有工作要做。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Closing-the-radiology-gender-gap-Progress-and-challenges-ahead.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Closing-the-radiology-gender-gap-Progress-and-challenges-ahead.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4d49fd6-d268-428b-a07a-32748c40664c Thu, 25 Jul 2024 21:05:33 -0400 Closing the radiology gender gap: Progress and challenges ahead
新研究揭穿适量饮酒对健康的益处可能每个人都听说过这样的传统观念：每天一杯酒对身体有益——或者您也听说过这种观念的一些变种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-study-debunks-the-health-benefits-of-moderate-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-study-debunks-the-health-benefits-of-moderate-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d29cada4-2933-49f6-a30f-1d8030cf208f Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:59:25 -0400 New study debunks the health benefits of moderate alcohol consumption
芬兰研究显示工作年龄成年人早发性痴呆症的发病率较高东芬兰大学、奥卢大学和芬兰神经中心开展的一项新的重大研究探讨了芬兰劳动年龄人口中的早发性痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Finnish-research-reveals-higher-incidence-of-early-onset-dementia-among-working-age-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Finnish-research-reveals-higher-incidence-of-early-onset-dementia-among-working-age-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a29793e-67c3-4fe0-b29e-d8e0452ed68d Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:53:42 -0400 Finnish research reveals higher incidence of early-onset dementia among working-age adults
揭示粪产碱菌对糖尿病伤口的治愈能力保持伤口和疮口清洁有很多重要原因，但宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的最新研究表明，某种细菌， https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Unveiling-the-healing-power-of-Alcaligenes-faecalis-in-diabetic-wounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Unveiling-the-healing-power-of-Alcaligenes-faecalis-in-diabetic-wounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2a433f2-fc57-4939-b7dc-5c1a89d50f54 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:47:19 -0400 Unveiling the healing power of Alcaligenes faecalis in diabetic wounds
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：哈里斯成为焦点由于副总统卡马拉·哈里斯似乎准备成为民主党总统候选人，总体卫生政策，特别是生殖健康问题可能会受到更高的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Harris-in-the-spotlight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Harris-in-the-spotlight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4371a1d7-441e-41f7-b283-8d359ccc9ea7 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:39:26 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Harris in the spotlight
地中海饮食可以成为避免妊娠糖尿病的秘诀吗？根据一项新的系统评价和荟萃分析，地中海饮食可显着降低妊娠期糖尿病（GDM）的风险。较高的坚持这种饮食习惯与较低的 GDM 发病率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Could-a-Mediterranean-diet-be-the-secret-to-avoiding-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Could-a-Mediterranean-diet-be-the-secret-to-avoiding-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=657e0b1e-c31d-42ef-ad28-2787852e43f1 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:33:00 -0400 Could a Mediterranean diet be the secret to avoiding gestational diabetes?
研究表明，与传统车型相比，电动滑板车和自行车的受伤率更高JAMA Network Open 的新研究强调了电动和传统两轮车辆骑手受伤率的上升。关键因素包括车辆类型、骑手年龄和头盔使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-reveals-higher-injury-rates-in-electric-scooters-and-bikes-vs-conventional-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-reveals-higher-injury-rates-in-electric-scooters-and-bikes-vs-conventional-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e947b479-67a4-48e4-b3a3-b7151b3273a4 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 20:17:00 -0400 Study reveals higher injury rates in electric scooters and bikes vs. conventional models
FAU 研究人员获得 701,000 美元资助，彻底改变癌症治疗虽然化疗在个性化方面取得了进展，但癌症的个性化放射治疗仍然不发达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/FAU-researcher-wins-24701000-grant-to-revolutionize-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/FAU-researcher-wins-24701000-grant-to-revolutionize-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b95694-fe12-4b41-a6d9-cdef31a818f8 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 12:50:12 -0400 FAU researcher wins $701,000 grant to revolutionize cancer treatment
MD 安德森和 Summit Therapeutics 合作加速 ivonescimab 开发德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Summit Therapeutics, Inc. 今天宣布达成一项为期五年的战略合作协议，旨在加速 ivonescimab 的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/MD-Anderson-and-Summit-Therapeutics-partner-to-accelerate-ivonescimab-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/MD-Anderson-and-Summit-Therapeutics-partner-to-accelerate-ivonescimab-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1372998-bab8-4675-a739-e74bd25bdf2c Thu, 25 Jul 2024 12:35:44 -0400 MD Anderson and Summit Therapeutics partner to accelerate ivonescimab development
德克萨斯心脏研究所和 BiVACOR 实现全人工心脏植入的里程碑德克萨斯心脏研究所 (THI) 和临床阶段医疗器械公司 BiVACOR 今天宣布，作为美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 早期项目的一部分，BiVACOR 全人工心脏 (TAH) 已成功首次人体植入可行性研究 (EFS) 于 2024 年 7 月 9 日进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Texas-Heart-Institute-and-BiVACOR-achieve-milestone-with-total-artificial-heart-implantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Texas-Heart-Institute-and-BiVACOR-achieve-milestone-with-total-artificial-heart-implantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f058ca5e-a3cc-49ae-a5f2-896ad1bddbea Thu, 25 Jul 2024 12:31:29 -0400 Texas Heart Institute and BiVACOR achieve milestone with total artificial heart implantation
